41452.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ちょっと暗くて:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>It's a little dark and dreary, but
this is our home.

41453.「……わしらは この洞くつで暮らす\n ただの 貧しい難民ですじゃ。\n それ以:
...We are just poor refugees living in
this cave. Nothing more, nothing less.

41455.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「レンジャーきょ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>I don't like the RANGER group, but I
love Yugiri! Because she's kind!

41456.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「わしらのことは:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>Don't worry about us, just go and stop
the fighting!

41457.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「オレたち ユウ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>We didn't kidnap Yugiri nee-chan!
She's our friend.

52163.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「じいちゃんが 外に:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Grandpa says I can't go outside. He
says the forest is angry.

52164.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「森が あのように荒:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>The forest has gone wild like that. Is
this our crime? At the very least, we
must protect our children.

41464.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「どーめいを や:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>When I was doing Domei, everyone
always had a scary face, but now
everyone is laughing.

41465.「伐採同盟なら 解散したぞい。\n 若い連中は 今頃 レーノスどのの指導の下で\:
The logging alliance has been dissolved. The young men should be planting trees under the guidance of
Renosu. They are not just cutting down trees, but nurturing young trees while receiving a share from the forest for
their needs. This is one way of thinking.

41466.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ユウギリねーち:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Yugiri still comes to visit us from
time to time. You can come here once
in a while, too!
